replies.bodyText:
I'd argue it's nessecary if someone adds a widget to a screen that needs to be ticked.
For example if someone added a sort of chyron to the title screen showing news about the latest snapshots, they would need to tick that element of the screen to advance the position of text.

replies.bodyText: So in case a tick-needed widget added to a non-ticking screen?
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
All screens are ticking, but child elements of a screen are not automatically ticking (some screen impls do do that).
Often the tick method of each element is called in the screen's tick method
